metadata.topic: End of the week thoughts - what are your thoughts on 20 years of Patch Tuesday?
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] End of the week thoughts - what are your thoughts on 20 years of Patch Tuesday?
metadata.email_text_clean:
Workstation patch parties with all hands on deck manually installing patches and
hoping to not need the SP 3 disk. But always needing it.
metadata.evaluated_keywords: ['deck manually instal patch', 'workstation patch party', 'sp 3 disk', 'always need']
metadata.email_text_original:
End of the week thoughts - what are your thoughts on 20 years of Patch Tuesday? 
You don't often get email from jeiversen@gmail.com. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Workstation patch parties with all hands on deck manually installing patches and
hoping to not need the SP 3 disk. But always needing it. 
Sent from my iPhone
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/9A7E1826-92AF-4070-9644-84A1D81AEB5D%40gmail.com
